TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed LightStyle extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies a lighting style for a three-dimensional (3D) chart area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The LightStyle enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea3DStyle.LightStyle%2A> property to set the lighting style of a 3D chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle Realistic = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A realistic lighting style is applied, where the hue of all chart area elements changes depending on the amount of rotation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle Simplistic = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A simplistic lighting style is applied, where the hue of all chart area elements is fixed.
